verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H559>told,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> your father is <S%H1>sick.<s%>" So he <S%H2470>took<s%> his <S%H3947>two<s%> <S%H8147>sons<s%> <S%H1121>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H4519>Ephraim<s%> with him.

When it was <S%H5046>told<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to you," <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2388>collected<s%> his <S%H2388>strength<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> up in the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me at <S%H3870>Luz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me,

and He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6509>make<s%> you <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>numerous,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>'

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to you in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> are mine; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> shall be mine, as <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> are.

"But your <S%H4138>offspring<s%> that have been <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them shall be yours; they shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>names<s%> of their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"Now as for me, when I <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H6307>Paddan,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> to my <S%H5921>sorrow,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> on the <S%H1870>journey,<s%> when there was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3530>some<s%> <S%H3530>distance<s%> <S%H776><s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath;<s%> and I <S%H6912>buried<s%> her <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%> (that is, <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%>)."
When <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> Joseph's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%>?"

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father, "They are my <S%H1>sons,<s%> <S%H1121>whom<s%> <S%H834>God<s%> has <S%H430>given<s%> me <S%H5414>here.<s%>" So he <S%H2088>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Bring<s%> them to me, <S%H3947>please,<s%> that I may <S%H4994>bless<s%> them."

Now the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were [so] <S%H3513>dim<s%> from <S%H2207>age<s%> [that] he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see.<s%> Then Joseph <S%H5066>brought<s%> them <S%H5066>close<s%> to him, and he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> them and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> them.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H6419>expected<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has let me <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H2233>children<s%> as <S%H1571>well.<s%>"
Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>took<s%> them from his <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> with his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> Israel's <S%H8040>left,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> with his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> Israel's <S%H3225>right,<s%> and <S%H5066>brought<s%> them <S%H5066>close<s%> to him.

But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> and his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> on <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'s <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H9603>crossing<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H3588>although<s%> Manasseh was the first-born.

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> my fathers <S%H1>Abraham<s%> and <S%H85>Isaac<s%> <S%H3327>walked,<s%> The <S%H1980>God<s%> who has been my <S%H430>shepherd<s%> <S%H7462>all<s%> <S%H4480><s%> my <S%H5750>life<s%> to <S%H5750>this<s%> <S%H2088>day,<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> who has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H5288>lads;<s%> And may my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>live<s%> on in them, And the <S%H8034>names<s%> of my fathers <S%H1>Abraham<s%> and <S%H85>Isaac;<s%> And may they <S%H3327>grow<s%> into a <S%H1711>multitude<s%> in the <S%H7230>midst<s%> of the <S%H7130>earth.<s%>"

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his father <S%H1>laid<s%> his <S%H7896>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> on Ephraim's <S%H3027>head,<s%> it <S%H7218>displeased<s%> him; and he <S%H7489>grasped<s%> his father's <S%H8551>hand<s%> to <S%H3027>remove<s%> it from Ephraim's <S%H5493>head<s%> to Manasseh's <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his father, "Not <S%H1>so,<s%> my father, for <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H1>one<s%> is the first-born. <S%H2088>Place<s%> your <S%H2088>right<s%> <S%H7760>hand<s%> on his <S%H3225>head.<s%>"

But his father <S%H1>refused<s%> and <S%H3985>said,<s%> "I <S%H559>know,<s%> my <S%H3045>son,<s%> I <S%H1121>know;<s%> he <S%H3045>also<s%> shall <S%H1571>become<s%> a <S%H1961>people<s%> and he <S%H5971>also<s%> shall be <S%H1571>great.<s%> <S%H1431>However,<s%> his <S%H199>younger<s%> <S%H9512>brother<s%> shall be <S%H251>greater<s%> <S%H1431>than<s%> he, and his <S%H4480>descendants<s%> shall <S%H2233>become<s%> a <S%H1961>multitude<s%> of <S%H4393>nations.<s%>"

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "By you <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1288>pronounce<s%> <S%H1288>blessing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'May <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you like <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh!<s%>'" Thus he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H4191>die,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> will be with you, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your fathers.

"And I <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>portion<s%> <S%H5921>more<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> with my <S%H2719>sword<s%> and my <S%H7198>bow.<s%>"
